subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: John Isner and Nicolas Mahut left Court 18 at Wimbledon with records for the longest match, in both time elapsed and number of games, in professional tennis history. Even though it had not ended.
snippet: John Isner and Nicolas Mahut left Court 18 at Wimbledon with records for the longest match, in both time elapsed and number of games, in professional tennis history. Even though it had not ended.
